name: Students-ws
body:
## Welcome to My API.

This data could help you use my API.

### Get All Students
If you want to get all student, please enter the following URL:
`http://localhost:3000/allStudents`

Result example:
`
[
{
student_id: 1,
name: "tom",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 81,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 2,
name: "yossi",
area: "south",
degree: "ba",
grade: 94,
year: 2
},
{
student_id: 3,
name: "bar",
area: "north",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 92,
year: 1
},
{
student_id: 4,
name: "gal",
area: "north",
degree: "ba",
grade: 72,
year: 3
},
]
`

###Get Student By Id
you can find a student by his Id, by entering the following URL:
`http://localhost:3000/getStudent/id`

Example:
`http://localhost:3000/getStudent/1`
and the result will be 
`
{
student_id: 1,
name: "tom",
area: "center",
degree: "bsc",
grade: 81,
year: 1
}
`

###get All Excellence Students
you can find all excellence students, by entering the following URL:
`http://localhost:3000/getAllExcellenceStudents`




### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
